title: League Can't Update
body: After opening the game.. its says that some error as accured with logs... please really need help in this... am missing league like crazy

replies.body: when opening the game... i updating screen comes... after a few updates its says something about some error with the logs !!!
When you say the game, do you mean the loading screen for the match or something else?  What is the error saying exactly?  I really want to help, but I need just a bit more info.  Let me know.
